trans-unit.source: Specifies the arrangement of pages when more than one page of content appears on a single side of print media.
trans-unit.target: 單面列印媒體上的多個內容頁面出現時，請指定頁面的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - As members of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A> collection, which is a property of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, these values indicate the page arrangements that the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: 主要用於這些用途使用此類型的值:-設為成員的<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A>集合，其屬性的<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>，這些值會指出的印表機支援的頁排列方式。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: - As the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, the value directs the printer to arrange pages of content in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: -做為值<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A>屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>，值會指示排列中指定方向的內容頁面的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> objects.
trans-unit.target: **未知**屬性中不會使用值<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>物件。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: You should never set a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> property to **Unknown**.
trans-unit.target: 您應該永遠不會設定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>屬性**未知**。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If some other <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the pages-per-sheet-direction feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*的方向每個工作表頁功能將無法辨識的選項 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，則<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有**未知**做為值<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.PagesPerSheetDirection%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>類別。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD︰ 如何︰ 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and right to left relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料行，從上的往下和由右至左相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and left to right relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料行，從上的往下和由左到右相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and top to bottom relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料列，從右至左和由上的而下，相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and bottom to top relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料列，從右至左和由下到上相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and top to bottom relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料列，從左到右，由上的而下，相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and bottom to top relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料列，從左到右及由下而上相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and right to left relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料行，從上而下和由右至左相對於頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and left to right relative to page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 頁面會出現在資料行，從下至上和相對於頁面方向由左至右。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 功能 （其選項由這個列舉表示） 設定中未定義的選項為[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
